channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water not draining away outside school again., 20th October
item.description:
Multiple drains outside Swindon Village Primary School are blocked causing a large build up of water into the road. Traffic not slowing down or going around the huge puddle is causing children and parents being soaked on the footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diversion signs left on verge, 20th October
item.description:
Diversion signs x2 used 2 months ago are still on the verge and should have been removed by the contractor. This has been reported multiple times but no action has been taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Norton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 20th October
item.description:
Police Control report that the temporary TS in the location are stuck on green in all directions. They are wary of the reporter's intentions, as this report arrived via email and there have been no further reports on this stretch of road.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping blowing into Wymans Brook, 20th October
item.description:
Fly tipping blowing into Wymans Brook causing an environmental problem and blowing into the car park in tenants areas.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wymans Court, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Water drain blocked by leaf fall at the end of Cox's way GL45LF, 20th October
item.description:
There are 2 water drains at the above location. The large volume of leaf fall is covering the drain on the right side if you are facing the end of the cul de sac.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cox's Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
